column5: I stumbled across this scene when I was out walking along the Lake O. waterfront in the GTA two days after the storm hit.    There was actually 5 of them trapped there and one dead possum in the basin.  Mark
That's sad.  As much as they're a pain in the arse, they did not deserve a death like that.  Paul
Pretty sure they are just playin possum. oops my bad, not funny.
They're so cute when they're sleeping.         Sorry....I just had to!!
That's too bad. I would rather see them on our roads...
35 bucks a hide ??? who needs a coon dog when mother nature is on your side
35 bucks for raccoon hides, who are you trying to kid, more like 3 dollars and 50 cents.
Looks like a twisted coon orgy gone bad!
